getOrientation

public final java.lang.String getOrientation()
Returns the orientation of the chart. Valid values are: vertical (default), horizontal.

setOrientation

public final void setOrientation(java.lang.String type)
Specifies the orientation of the chart. Valid values are: vertical (default), horizontal.

getSliceGaps

public final java.lang.Number getSliceGaps()
Return the presence and size of the gaps between slices. Valid values range from 0 (default) to 1, where 1 produces the maximum supported slice gaps.

setSliceGaps

public final void setSliceGaps(java.lang.Number gap)
Specifies the presence and size of the gaps between slices. Valid values range from 0 (default) to 1, where 1 produces the maximum supported slice gaps.

getThreeDEffect

public final java.lang.String getThreeDEffect()
Returns whether the chart is displayed with a 3D effect. Valid values are "on" and "off" (default).

setThreeDEffect

public final void setThreeDEffect(java.lang.String effect)
Specifies whether the chart is displayed with a 3D effect. Valid values are "on" and "off" (default).
